about_the_game:
FOUNDER'S PACK
Give your new characters an early boost with a full set of armor and 10,000 gold that will give you the edge early game.
Talk to Valisi at any hub to claim your items!

OSWARY DEATH KNIGHT ARMOR SET
+20 Armor
+10 Health
+10 Stamina
+10 Mana
+50% XP Bonus
+25% Critical Damage Multiplier
+5% Critical Hit Chance
+25% Harvesting Chance

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Dungeons of Edera: Founder's Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 / Intel Core i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5600 XT / Geforce GTX 1060 (3 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 / Intel Core i5-9500F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT / Geforce RTX 2060 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Give your new characters an early boost with a full set of armor and 10,000 gold that will give you the edge early game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
